solution_line_template: They collected {team_members} x {blankets_per_person_day1} = <<{team_members}*{blankets_per_person_day1}={blankets_day1}>>{blankets_day1} blankets on the first day.
Freddie and his team collected {blankets_day1} x {multiplier_day2} = <<{blankets_day1}*{multiplier_day2}={blankets_day2}>>{blankets_day2} blankets on the second day.
They collected a total of {blankets_day2} + {blankets_day3}+{blankets_day1} = <<{blankets_day2}+{blankets_day3}+{blankets_day1}={total_blankets}>>{total_blankets} for three days.
